dynamicLookup.nsql: select @SELECT:SR.id:RESOURCE_ID@, @SELECT:SR.unique_name:RESOURCE_CODE@, @SELECT:SR.full_name:FULL_NAME@, @SELECT:SR.LAST_NAME:LAST_NAME@, @SELECT:SR.FIRST_NAME:FIRST_NAME@, @SELECT:(case when SR.RESOURCE_TYPE=0 then 'L' when SR.RESOURCE_TYPE=1 then 'Q' when SR.RESOURCE_TYPE=2 then 'M' when SR.RESOURCE_TYPE=3 then 'X' END):resource_type@, @SELECT:NLS.NAME:resource_type_caption@, @SELECT:LANG.ID:LANGUAGE_ID@, @SELECT:LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE:LANGUAGE_CODE@, @SELECT:SR.LAST_UPDATED_DATE:LAST_UPDATED_DATE@ from SRM_RESOURCES SR, PRJ_RESOURCES PRJRES,PAC_MNT_RESOURCES PR, CMN_LOOKUPS_V NLS, CMN_LANGUAGES LANG where @FILTER@ and SR.id=PR.id and SR.id=PRJRES.PRID and PRJRES.PRISROLE = 0 and NLS.language_code = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ and NLS.lookup_type = 'RESOURCE_TYPE' and NLS.lookup_code = SR.RESOURCE_TYPE AND NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE = LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE AND (@WHERE:SECURITY:RESOURCE:SR.ID@) @BROWSE-ONLY: AND SR.IS_ACTIVE=1 AND PR.ACTIVE=1 AND (SR.RESOURCE_TYPE IN( select (case when VALUE='LABOR' then 0 when VALUE='EQUIPMENT' then 1 when VALUE='MATERIAL' then 2 when VALUE='EXPENSE' then 3 END) RESOURCE_TYPE from ODF_MULTI_VALUED_LOOKUPS where object='transactionheader' and attribute='txn_type' and pk_id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:TXN_HEADER_ID_CONSTRAIN@ ) or @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:TXN_HEADER_ID_CONSTRAIN@ is null) :BROWSE-ONLY@

select @SELECT:SR.id:RESOURCE_ID@, @SELECT:SR.unique_name:RESOURCE_CODE@, @SELECT:SR.full_name:FULL_NAME@, @SELECT:SR.LAST_NAME:LAST_NAME@, @SELECT:SR.FIRST_NAME:FIRST_NAME@, @SELECT:(case when SR.RESOURCE_TYPE=0 then 'L' when SR.RESOURCE_TYPE=1 then 'Q' when SR.RESOURCE_TYPE=2 then 'M' when SR.RESOURCE_TYPE=3 then 'X' END):resource_type@, @SELECT:NLS.NAME:resource_type_caption@, @SELECT:LANG.ID:LANGUAGE_ID@, @SELECT:LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE:LANGUAGE_CODE@, @SELECT:SR.LAST_UPDATED_DATE:LAST_UPDATED_DATE@ from SRM_RESOURCES SR, PRJ_RESOURCES PRJRES,PAC_MNT_RESOURCES PR, CMN_LOOKUPS_V NLS, CMN_LANGUAGES LANG where @FILTER@ and SR.id=PR.id and SR.id=PRJRES.PRID and PRJRES.PRISROLE = 0 and NLS.language_code = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ and NLS.lookup_type = 'RESOURCE_TYPE' and NLS.lookup_code = SR.RESOURCE_TYPE AND NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE = LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE AND (@WHERE:SECURITY:RESOURCE:SR.ID@) @BROWSE-ONLY: AND SR.IS_ACTIVE=1 AND PR.ACTIVE=1 AND (SR.RESOURCE_TYPE IN( select (case when VALUE='LABOR' then 0 when VALUE='EQUIPMENT' then 1 when VALUE='MATERIAL' then 2 when VALUE='EXPENSE' then 3 END) RESOURCE_TYPE from ODF_MULTI_VALUED_LOOKUPS where object='transactionheader' and attribute='txn_type' and pk_id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:TXN_HEADER_ID_CONSTRAIN@ ) or @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:TXN_HEADER_ID_CONSTRAIN@ is null) :BROWSE-ONLY@

select @SELECT:SR.id:RESOURCE_ID@, @SELECT:SR.unique_name:RESOURCE_CODE@, @SELECT:SR.full_name:FULL_NAME@, @SELECT:SR.LAST_NAME:LAST_NAME@, @SELECT:SR.FIRST_NAME:FIRST_NAME@, @SELECT:(case when SR.RESOURCE_TYPE=0 then 'L' when SR.RESOURCE_TYPE=1 then 'Q' when SR.RESOURCE_TYPE=2 then 'M' when SR.RESOURCE_TYPE=3 then 'X' END):resource_type@, @SELECT:NLS.NAME:resource_type_caption@, @SELECT:LANG.ID:LANGUAGE_ID@, @SELECT:LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE:LANGUAGE_CODE@, @SELECT:SR.LAST_UPDATED_DATE:LAST_UPDATED_DATE@ from SRM_RESOURCES SR, PRJ_RESOURCES PRJRES,PAC_MNT_RESOURCES PR, CMN_LOOKUPS_V NLS, CMN_LANGUAGES LANG where @FILTER@ and SR.id=PR.id and SR.id=PRJRES.PRID and PRJRES.PRISROLE = 0 and NLS.language_code = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ and NLS.lookup_type = 'RESOURCE_TYPE' and NLS.lookup_code = cast (SR.RESOURCE_TYPE as text) AND NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE = LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE AND (@WHERE:SECURITY:RESOURCE:SR.ID@) @BROWSE-ONLY: AND SR.IS_ACTIVE=1 AND PR.ACTIVE=1 AND (SR.RESOURCE_TYPE IN( select (case when VALUE='LABOR' then 0 when VALUE='EQUIPMENT' then 1 when VALUE='MATERIAL' then 2 when VALUE='EXPENSE' then 3 END) RESOURCE_TYPE from ODF_MULTI_VALUED_LOOKUPS where object='transactionheader' and attribute='txn_type' and pk_id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:TXN_HEADER_ID_CONSTRAIN@ ) or @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:TXN_HEADER_ID_CONSTRAIN@ is null) :BROWSE-ONLY@
